communications.subject: Michigan Freedom of Information Act Request: Vehicular Pursuit Policy (Dearborn Police Department)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Michigan Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All current policies maintained by the department regarding vehicle pursuits (also known as: car chase, vehicular response policy, vehicular pursuit procedure, fleet crashes).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau

communications.subject: [External Message Added] City of Dearborn public records request #23-2390
communications.communication:
City of Dearborn ************************************************************************ A message was sent to you regarding record request #23-2390: Hello, Your Freedom of Information Act request has been received. Your request can take 5 - 15 business days to review. If the information requested can be released, your request will be fulfilled at that time. If your request is for video or audio, your request can take 5 - 15 days to review. If the media requested can be released, you will receive a cost estimate for your request. All fees must be paid before any work is performed. Please make note of your Request Number, located in the upper left corner of your screen, you will need this Request Number for all communications regarding your FOIA Request. If you have any questions please contact policefoia@dearborn.gov or 313-943-2230. Thank you, Dearborn Police FOIA Department ************************************************************************ Questions about your request? Reply to this email or sign in to contact staff at City of Dearborn.
Technical support: See our help page
